sen.j: また、「長瀬」を名乗っていたことから、初めは碧海郡長瀬（現岡崎市森越町）に住んでおり、吉良東条に移ったのは後年のことと推測されている（あるいは子で吉良満氏の養子説のある経氏からか）。
sen.e: Also, since he used the name 'Nagase,' it is thought that he first lived in Nagase village, Aominokoori (present Morikoshi-cho, Okazaki City) and later he moved to Kira Tojo (or Tsuneuji, his son and adopted son of Mitsuuji KIRA, moved to Kira Tojo).

sen.e: According to "Takisan-ji engi" (engi (writing about the history) of the Takisan-ji Temple), when a memorial service was held for the first anniversary of Yoshiuji ASHIKAGA's death at Takisan-ji Temple in 1255, Hokke-do Hall was newly built.
